website_summaries.verdict: The headrest DVD player to consider if you don't need the most in terms of screen size or features.
pros: Comes as a complete set, including two headrest DVD monitors, a remote control, mounting hardware, and wires
The dual-monitor setup is perfect for providing passengers in both rear seats an individual entertainment system to use on long drives
cons: The seven-inch screen is too small to see from third-row seats comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This company has terrible customer service. The item description is not accurate. I purchased and tried and tried to make this item work, but it just wouldn't work- the fittings are not good sizes to fit all vehicles. But I tried. When I tried to return, this seller would just return my emails. Would not help. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Look great! Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2018 Tacoma doublecab. Headrests fit and look awesome, like they are supposed to be stock. Match the leather perfect. Install took about an hour, just because I wanted to run wiring in hidden areas. The sound level is off a bit, but it seems that you can adjust the dvd monitor and it makes the other monitor louder. Just had to play with it to find a good balance. Only complaint is, the “resume” feature is hit or miss. If it continues, I may need to return, as going through the menu to find the last scene is a pain. Other than this, you can’t beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: Glockamole

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product did not last 24 hours before several different issues occurred. Horizontal purple line through the center of the 2nd screen appeared. DVD player stopped playing and then spun loudly after powered down. Product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: You’ll pay to return it
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install, had to use you tube videos because instructions weren’t weren’t clear. Even like that, we couldn’t get it to work. Requested a refund, got approved but I had to pay the return, which wasn’t cheap. I wouldn’t recommend his product to anyone, specially because I had to pay to return something that never worked.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2010 Ford Fusion. VERY complicated to install. Barely any instructions, even my husband that is very good at putting car stereos had trouble, finally got it installed and when we used them the dvd would either skip really bad or just wouldnt play. Called Rockville customer service and they basically told me they couldnt help me because I bought it from Amazon not them. Returned to Amazon and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install once I figured out one thing...
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. It’s great for the price. I highly recommend buying the cigarette lighter adapter (shown in the “purchased together”) it the easiest way to install and power the device so you don’t have to wire it to your car! YouTube how to install car head rest DVD player and there are some help videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Know what your doing before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Most people will purchase these before they go through the steps of installation like I did. First you need to find out if you can actually install these in you car. A lot of new cars are starting to have airbags in the head rests which makes having these imposable unless you want your airbag light on all the time. Which in some states is illegal. So before install I would go through your owners manual or take apart the back of your chair and head rest to see if they will work. Good luck all.
customer_reviews.author: Erick G

customer_reviews.title: Run! Horrible seller!
customer_reviews.text: Would not work in my car. Seller refused to refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Krussel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Husband installed them in less than hour. Very easy. Picture and sound quality are amazing! I got the black leather ones, the interior in my 4Runner is black cloth and the leather headrests look like they are part of the vehicle. The leather matches the trim nicely. My 2 kids love them and have no trouble seeing the movies. We are thinking about buying another set for my husbands car. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miki S.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions would have been nice.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions tell you to refer to “wiring guide” which wasn’t included and was nowhere to be found online. No answer when I called the company. Even with the adapters the headrest posts don’t fit snug. I feel like it would be a big safety hazard in an accident. DH will decide if we’re keeping them once he gets home.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product! As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the excellent product. The headrest DVD players are immaculate, and the quality of the leather headrest is also excellent. They matched my leather I have in my Cadillac Escalade perfectly! The quality was so nice I purchased 4 total to complete all of the headrest with DVD players. They work flawlessly! I recommend this product to anyone looking for qaulity headrest DVD players!
customer_reviews.author: Rashawn turk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but now I wish I had two DVD players instead of one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: So just installed these into 2012 chevy malibu and it was very easy and straight forward. Only issue i had or have is that the headrest has a slight wiggle and none of the adapters work to get a snug fit. Also just a heads up i had to use Avi format when downloading movies onto a SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install, but love the end result
customer_reviews.text: NOT easy to install. Took hubby an entire day to get it set up. But once I stalled it’s AWESOME to have in the car for the kids. Love the dual headphone jacks and speakers. Haven’t gotten the external player mode to work- meaning linking to my phone to watch Netflix etc... but the DVD players work great. However, you need to make sure the dvd door is really closed tight. Have to kind of slam it down so it can read the disc properly. It’s a great feature for the long trips in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you like to destroy your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: So after a few months after owning this. It fried 3 fuseboxes,melted 50 ft of wire at least. It will cause your vehicle electronics to surge. Yes very easy to install but a pain in the rear!!!!! Multiple attempts to contact the manufacturers,no answer,no response,nothing. Contact amazon few hundred times the same bs repeated."We are sorry!" Really? If you want enjoyment in the rear seat buy a generator, small tv, a dvd player and wah lah! Problem solved!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for road trips
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2009 GMC Yukon and couldn’t be happier. Had a 14 hour trip with two kids and they were a life saver. Super easy install, they worked great, kids were super happy. Only down side is the remote doesn’t work, and the secondary monitor is a little loud (you can hear the power surge when you accelerate) other than that no issues at all. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Matwich

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic DVD Headrests
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a road trip and have little ones. Installation was fairly easy, but was a bit difficult to get the wires fished through the back of the seats on our Highlander. In the end, it worked out perfectly for what we wanted/needed and would definitely recommend. Not sure why, but haven't found blu-ray players like this yet. Weird!
customer_reviews.author: Avid-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.... not sound
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time as well had everything to install it easily. The only complaints I have was my package did not come with the wiring guide which was easily figured out by a few YouTube videos. The main concern is that from the first time I have turned them on one head rest puts out a very annoying humming sound when playing from the speakers when headphones are not connected, luckily the kids like their headphones but the first two times we used them and they didn’t have them with them we got quite the headache after about 30 min of that noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jadeth Sherratt

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2010 Tahoe. Installation is easy! Quality of the "leather" is excellent and matches the stock seats almost perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Recieved one set of these April 2020, appeared to be good quality and leather matched very close to our stock leather suburban. Install was pretty easy. Issue is it is now end of June and both stopped working. The non dvd headrest sound has quit, and the dvd player headrest will not even turn on amymore. Checked everything from wiring to fuses (licensed electrician) and while checking things I went to tilt headrest and a gear popped out and now it just flops around. Luckily we still have our original headrest as we will be removing these as they no longer function and unfortunately we are past the return policy on these.
customer_reviews.author: Victor McNew

customer_reviews.title: quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for less than a year the buttons don't work. The tilt adjustment for the headrest is not working. The screen has horrible image quality right from the time i bought it. Don't get this. It too expensive
customer_reviews.author: T. Antos

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the worse
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken wire didnt know that till after I had it professionally installed amazon refused to help said I had to return it but it costed me 60 to install another 60 to take out
customer_reviews.author: winters

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: These DVD players were easy enough to install and were a benefit to our long drives to see relatives...for 6 months. Then they broke and would not play DVD’s anymore. I was hoping the money I spent would get me a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: No safety features
customer_reviews.text: So this product's claims to be universal, but it has no locking feature in the head rest. So in an accident, one might say could come out and become a Projectile. So when return because if this issue, also got charged $20 to ship the head Rest back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hunter

customer_reviews.title: No sound on the monitor side
customer_reviews.text: Picture is good headrest look good but the sound is a problem it's not very loud and the monitor side does not give out any sound very disappointed other than that it is a good product I just put a splitter in on the main unit gave my kids each a headset
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy just plain cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan these are cheap they work great as far as picture Clarity volume Interactive but if you lean your head back they snap and are all wobbly and broken I've had to replace two sets I won't buy these again
customer_reviews.author: jeremy ditzler

customer_reviews.title: not compatible
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known this product was not compatable to a Kia Sorento due to the airbag placement
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had my dad install this for me and it took him about 3 hours. We had to buy an additional piece so it did not come with everything needed. Works great cant figure out to how get the headphones to connect to the tv though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: They work well for a good price. It would be nice if they connections were updated to HDMI. Install was not very hard, plenty of YouTube videos to help those who are not skilled in electronics. Keeps the kids occupied
customer_reviews.author: CollinF

customer_reviews.title: Would consider prof installation Once installed they are great. Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but challenging to install. Needs to be hard wired to vehicle. Would consider prof installation Once installed they are great. Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Once installed it’s works very well. Good quality for the money. I ended up having to take it to an auto shop for installation.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved watching her movies from a thumbdrive
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved watching her movies from a thumbdrive. No messing with DVD'S just files of multiple movies on the stick. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Old GrandPa

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, high price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, just kind of overpriced for the build quality.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it was easy to install an it's been a year still good my kids love it so I love it lol

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time & money.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these, the DVD player’s door doesn’t close properly so it won’t play. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price! Kids are happy now, which makes the wife happy, which makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Found them hard to install and returned them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jlow

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but it did not come with lighter adapter and did not want to take lighter out to wire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last long at all.. only one Monitor Works 😌

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I added this set in my vehicle and I'm very pleased with them. Easy to install only took about one hour and work perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They work good, but they are cheap. (you get what you pay for)

customer_reviews.title: HDMI & USB are not available for the second display.
customer_reviews.text: USB & HDMI inputs do not work on the second sceen! Only the DVD player... not good enough. On the video tutorial says that They work together. But NO!

customer_reviews.title: Cleap international components
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my truck on 6/9/19 and the tilt of the head rest has already broken. Now the tv just points in a downward position. I would not recommend

customer_reviews.title: Soooo worth buying!

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are part of CV the headrest
customer_reviews.text: Well after reading the direction it went pretty smooth. I think it will keep the kids entertained every time we are in the car. Than you Rockville

customer_reviews.text: Product for great in my 2015 Accord Sport. Fairly easy to install. Kids love it!

customer_reviews.title: works great so
customer_reviews.text: It was a quick install and haven't had any issues.. works great so far

customer_reviews.title: These are the cheapest pieces of junk!! Do ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest pieces of junk!! Do NOT BUY these. Rattle around in your headrest ports, can't adjust the screens because they will tilt to the side! NO SOUND Total JUNK, and now that I have 3 hours invested in installing these P.O.S.'s Rockville will not let me send these back!! I want my money back. Buyer beware you get what you pay for. I read the reports on Amazon and used that info. to make this purchase. Amazon needs to bear some responsibility as well, I feel very mislead and I'm out $$$$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: because it wasn't an easy task. 1
customer_reviews.text: Were beyond pisssst! We paid to have these installed, because it wasn't an easy task. 1. The DVD latch continues to pop open 2. Won't play movies from my iPhone when connected 3. Can't raise the volume up + on the main/lead headrest, you can't hear anything unless you have headphones plugged in. 3. When you plug in headphones to the second headrests, you can still hear audio from the speakers and none in the headphones. 4. No instruction manuals on how to work, you have to guess. Wasted my money to get these profesionaly installed..... not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: N.M.L.

customer_reviews.title: My car looks great and the kids love them...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2014 Chevy cruze... these did not fit so I had to do some rigging to get them to fit tight and stay in place... but other than that they're great. The picture quality is great but the sound is kind of old school lol wire it to your car speakers before you finish its definitely worth the extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE after a week one of the monitors began falling ...
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE after a week one of the monitors began falling out of the headrest. annoying but figured for 200.00 what the hell right? wrong. after 47 days from install the main dvd player will not turn on, thinking it could be a wiring issue to be safe but no all the wiring checked out this thing will not turn on tried the remote and nothing. if your wanting QUALITY save for a better product these are not worth the amount listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: No IR
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is that there is no way to activate IR function. In manual is showing third remote control with button IR. Description was: "Rockville RDP711-BK 7” Black dvd/USB/SD car headrest monitors with ir transmitter and HDMI input"... Where is IR?How to activate it?
customer_reviews.author: Hristo L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall I would not recommend them unless you have another source for video and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I got these in my van and wired up and tested. The DVD worked well. The sound from the headrests was a joke. There might as well not had speakers. I could hardly hear them when sitting in a parked car none the less when there is road noise. The Head phone jacks work well and I fed the sound to my radio. I then tried the DVD again and it would not work. I run video from another source and they work well with that. Overall I would not recommend them unless you have another source for video and don't need the DVD player. For that they work well.
customer_reviews.author: chrsgrbr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my husband loved the price and we will continue ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: screen quality is awesome and sound on these are just fine
customer_reviews.text: installed these myself in my wifes 2016 honda accord sport, install was very simple. screen quality is awesome and sound on these are just fine. for the price there awesome I have read a lot of reviews from other people about these head rests and the tan ones about pour mounting and terrible sound, not sure if i was a lucky one but I have had zero issues and they mount nice and tight. If you dont know what you are doing then have them installed by someone that does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works however
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up looks great, feels good, however sound on master unit isnt working at all out of the box so has me kinda ify about my purchase now. Id like to hear from customer service about this issue.

But nothing about How to connect to power source!?!?!?! Tried to look up videos or instructions on the internet to see how to install these things, but nothing about the wiring. So I guess I will need to find someone who can install them . So far I don't know if they work or not but I am definitely frustrated.

product_meta.title: Rockville RDP711-BK 7” Black Car Headrest Monitors w/DVD Player/USB/HDMI+Games
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:7 inch| style:With DVDThe Rockville RDP711 is a 7"" complete car video entertainment system. The RDP711 features a universal fit system and it includes all the necessary parts to fit any vehicle. It has adjustable and detachable metal poles that adjust left to right from 4"" inches to 7"" inches. Rockville will have you up and running and enjoying your system in almost no time. Installation is very simple. Just power and ground wires. Rockville takes the rocket science out of system integration, with our detailed and easy Do-It-Yourself Instructions. (Our instructions are written so that it is easy to understand). The headrests are manufactured of high quality leatherette with a plush comfortable finish and modeled to integrate perfectly into any vehicle.
Two headrest are included. The main headrest features a front loading DVD player that will play on both headrests. (The second headrest is standalone video monitor that will play whatever is on the main monitor). All Rockville DVD units are manufactured using original Sony laser lens pick ups for the absolute best DVD playability. No skipping or pausing. And even home made discs will play with no problem. Our loaders and spin motors are Japanese made by Mabuchi the world leader in DVD spin technology. This is one of the major differences between Rockville and some of the other brands. Image quality is at an amazing 800 x 480 resolution. The picture is crystal clear because this model is upgraded with digital panels that give a much higher resolution display than the older technology panels. All Rockville video products go through an extensive testing phase before production. We take a sample unit and keep it on for days straight (24 hours a day) and ensure that the picture stays crystal clear even after the monitor being on for long periods of time. The quality and longevity of these are among the best in the industry.
feature_bullets: Rockville RDP711-BK 7” Black dvd/USB/SD car headrest monitors with ir transmitter and HDMI input
One Front Loading dvd Player, RDP711-BK Rdp71 + One a/V unit RDP711-BK Rhp7
800 x 480 screen resolution.16:9 (wide screen) or 4:3 (letterbox) switchable Aspect ratio
Built-in FM transmitter for wireless audio playback through vehicle stereo system.NOT compatible if you have motorized headrests or rear seat air bags

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars216 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
